official_title: A bill to revoke the temporary withdrawal of certain lands, located in Inyo County, California, from settlement, location sale, or entry.

summary.text: Revokes the executive withdrawal of specified lands in Inyo County, California, from settlement, location, sale or entry.

titles.title: A bill to revoke the temporary withdrawal of certain lands, located in Inyo County, California, from settlement, location sale, or entry.
